trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_SEQ_00<tab>Auriaune is lost in thought.

TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_SEQ_01<tab>A large amount of supplies were recently stolen from Falcon's Nest. Auriaune asks you to be on the lookout for a group of suspicious characters moving a large crate of Ishgardian supplies in the Coerthas area.
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_SEQ_02<tab>You have found the thieves and dealt with them. Return the stolen crate to Auriaune at Falcon's Nest.

TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_SEQ_03<tab>Auriaune thanks you for recovering the stolen goods. She also finds something curious within the crate: a feather ornament. She is able to identify it as being from the Sixth Astral Era, but can tell no more than that. She asks you to take it to Sigan, a local man who collects relics from that period.
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_SEQ_04<tab>Sigan thanks you for the ornament. He points out that they were a common sight in Falcon's Nest─before the Calamity, that is.
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_TODO_00<tab>Find the stolen supplies.
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the supplies to Auriaune.
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the ornament to Sigan.
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_000<tab>I look worried, you say? Nothing of the sort. I was simply thinking about something─the rebuilding of Falcon's Nest, in fact.
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_001<tab>The damage from the Calamity─and the freezing winds it brought with it─was tremendous. Even the rats fled, driven out by the cold.

TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_002<tab>With the impostor Guillaime dealt with, we can move forward with the rebuilding of the fortifications. I'm truly delighted─and proud─to be a part of it. But it's no simple task.

TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_003<tab>The heretic's various supporters are obviously still a major concern. And the High Houses still have their squabbles and their disputes with the citizenry. Frankly, there's no end to the difficulties we face.
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_004<tab>Just yesterday, some valuable supplies went missing─stolen from within this very fortress, right beneath our noses!

TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_005<tab>We've no leads, and we don't have the resources to scour the highlands looking for these supplies. But if you happen to see a group of suspicious-looking fellows carrying a large crate with them, it may well be our stolen goods. Please recover them for us.
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_010<tab>Have you seen any suspicious people carrying a crate of stolen Ishgardian supplies?
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_030<tab>Have you found the stolen supplies?
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_031<tab>Yes, yes! This is the very crate that was stolen. This looks very much like the heretics' handiwork.
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_032<tab>...But there's something in here that shouldn't be. A feather ornament? Whatever could it mean...?

TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_033<tab>It looks like a type of ornament that was popular in Falcon's Nest before the Calamity. This sort of thing is of no use to us here─a mere decorative trinket. But there is someone who might be interested in it.

TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_034<tab>There's a humorless old man named Sigan who collects antiques from the small mountain village that used to be here at Falcon's Nest. I'm sure he'd love to take a look at something like this. Do you think you could do me a favor and take it to him?
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_AURIAUNE_000_043<tab>Have you taken that ornament to Sigan yet?
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_SIGAN_000_040<tab>Hm? Did you want something?
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_SIGAN_000_041<tab>Ah, you used to see these all the time before the Calamity─back before Falcon's Nest ended up looking like this.
TEXT_HEAVNZ008_01733_SIGAN_000_042<tab>This brings back some memories. You say it was left with supplies stolen by the heretics? ...Well, thank you, in any case.
